issue.title: Remove targetyo.yogiyo.co.kr domain from DNS filter list
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for iOS ### AdGuard version 4.5.11 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? Mobile ### Where is the problem encountered? https://apps.apple.com/kr/app/%EB%B0%B0%EB%8B%AC%EC%9A%94%EA%B8%B0%EC%9A%94-%EA%B8%B0%EB%8B%A4%EB%A6%BC-%EC%97%86%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%9B%EC%A7%91-%EB%B0%B0%EB%8B%AC%EC%95%B1/id543831532 ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters AdGuard DNS filter ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. `targetyo.yogiyo.co.kr` domain use core location api for our business (critical problem). So please remove both `targetyo.yogiyo.co.kr` and `static-webviews.yogiyo.co.kr` domains from DNS filter list. If you have any question about this issue, please mention to me. 2. Ref issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/210863 3. Added filter - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/708dc5ce9ad3ec41afad6db6f759c5020ab1aed0/SpywareFilter/sections/tracking_servers_firstparty.txt#L83 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @piquark6046 I checked how to handle network error from Android platform, they said that has no handle (like bypass) when change who user location or address. But we cannot recievie mandatory informations related user location, occur critical problems our app's happy path for order. It means our customer cannot order by our app. Therefore, targetyo.yogiyo.co.kr domain must remove from AdGuard DNS filter list. Would you please review it as soon as possible? Thanks.

comment.body:
These are incomplete. They are correct for the home page, but these ads are also on several pages of the site.  #212857 was listing the affiliate links used for ads.

Further examples not fixed by this commit:

- https://www.hdnumerique.com/actualite/articles/22237-melodie-bonheur-4k.html
- https://www.hdnumerique.com/dossiers/653-labyrinthe-terre-brulee-en-blu-ray-le-test-complet.html 

On these pages, the affiliate domain is also tidd.ly or amzn.to. Using your logic, these should all be blocked with: 
`aside:has(.buttons.has-addons[onclick^="location.href='https://www.amazon.fr/dp/"], .buttons.has-addons[onclick^="location.href='https://amzn.to"], .buttons.has-addons[onclick^="location.href='https://tidd.ly"])`
However, it appears the selector is too restrictive and these ads persists because of a difference in code structure.
